honors_and_awards.description: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur recognizes its alumni for providing outstanding service to the Institute.Nominations are shortlisted by a Screening Committee (SC) chaired by the Dean (AA).The Standing Committee chaired by the Director considers all eligible nominations as well as recommendations from the Screening Committee and makes final recommendations to the Board of Governors for approval.
